short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Results with space themed background.
short.fr: Recherche Web avec un theme de voyage spacial.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Ditch the boring search engine—get the Happy-Hours Space Theme! 🌌

Turn your search page into a starry adventure. Customize everything:

✨ Speed & Number of Stars: Chill sky or a fast-moving galaxy? You choose!
🌟 Star Size & Color: Big and bold or small and subtle—it's up to you.
🖼️ Custom Background: Upload your own image and make the universe yours.
Take control and create your own space vibe. 🌠 Explore in style!
long.fr:
Cette extension change votre moteur de recherche pour happy-hours spacial theme.
Vous pouvez changer la vitesse, la taille et la couleur des étoiles.
